org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage
Interface IAeProcessStateConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeProcessStateConnection
public interface IAeProcessStateConnection

Defines interface for storing and retrieving process state and variable documents.

Method Summary
 void close()
          Called to close the connection.
 void commit()
          Makes all changes permanent and releases any database locks currently held by this object.
 org.w3c.dom.Document getProcessDocument()
          Returns the stored state document for a process.
 org.w3c.dom.Document getVariableDocument(long aLocationId, int aVersionNumber)
          Returns the stored state document for a variable.
 boolean isStoredVariable(long aLocationId, int aVersionNumber)
          Returns true if and only if the specified variable is already stored.
 void removeJournalEntries(AeLongSet aJournalIds)
          Removes the journal entries with the given ids.
 void rollback()
          Undoes all changes made in the current transaction and releases any database locks currently held by this object.
 void saveLog(IAeProcessLogEntry aLogEntry)
          Saves the log to storage.
 void saveProcess(AeFastDocument aDocument, int aProcessState, int aProcessStateReason, java.util.Date aStartDate, java.util.Date aEndDate, int aPendingInvokesCount)
          Saves process to storage.
 void saveVariable(IAeBusinessProcess aProcess, IAeVariable aVariable, AeFastDocument aDocument)
          Saves a process variable to storage.
 void trimStoredVariables(IAeLocationVersionSet aKeepSet)
          Trims the variables stored for the process to the specified set.
